name: Ruhi
description:
Ruhi is a 2D narrative-driven puzzle game where Ruhi, the village healer, learns that she has been inside of an illusion and must break the Diamond to set herself and the village free.

Controls:

WASD - Move

F - Interact

Click through text to advance

Women in Games Jam Submission

CREDITS:

Artist - Steph (https://sramosdraws.wixsite.com/portfolio)

Story Writer - Nimrita

Producer - Chad
